TEST SUR FONCTION:

Classe Letting :

class lettings.models.Letting(*args, **kwargs)

A model representing a letting.

Attributes:

  • title (str): The title of the letting.

  • address (Address): The address of the letting.

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned

Function Letting :

lettings.views.letting(request, letting_id)

Display details of a specific letting.

Args:

  • request (HttpRequest): The received HTTP request object.

  • letting_id (int): The ID of the letting to display.

Returns:

  • HttpResponse: The HTTP response object that displays the letting details.
